title: @Riot Why is every 6.5 skin out EXCEPT the Kha'Zix one?
body:
It's way past due, where is it?

edit: FINALLY jeepers lol

replies.body: Once again, took you so long, it killed most of the hype... (getting him anyway... my favourite champ and that skin is awesome! but you still took too long! am not as far as happy about that purchase as i coulde be... :( )

Hey! 

Thanks for the feedback here! In general, we try to space out skin releases because we don't want one to outshine another, and in some cases, we have promotional materials associated with them, and they're also timed accordingly - especially when it comes to holidays.
Yeah I've been patiently waiting :) Looks great.
